Title: What Great Teachers Do - Encore episode - #14 of 2017 of the 10-Minute Teacher
Description:
Global Teacher Prize finalist Joe Fatheree talks about what great teachers do. He shares his observations and also his hopes for improving the profession.

www.coolcatteacher.com/e207

Check out the free resource: “Goodbye Teacher Tired: 5 Days to Doing Fewer Things Better” from Angela Watson. Save time. Teach better.
